definition: see 安然無恙|安然无恙[an1 ran2 wu2 yang4]

sentences.english: The twittering of birds distracted me from sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 小鳥的鳴叫令我睡意全無。

sentences.english: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision has any value.
sentences.chinese: 原來在基督耶穌裏，受割禮不受割禮，全無功效。

sentences.english: One brainstorming tactic, however, piqued his curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 然而三星的一個發展策略讓他的好奇心全無。

sentences.english: They received me with a complete lack of enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 他們接待我時全無熱情。

sentences.english: By the time you get back home, huffing and puffing, you probably will have discovered that your cravings have totally subsided.
sentences.chinese: 當你氣喘吁吁地回到家裏，你可能發現食慾全無。

sentences.english: But Mr Trump's antagonism towards China is a gamble without an upside.
sentences.chinese: 不過，特朗普與中國對抗將是一場全無好處的賭博。

sentences.english: Most importantly it will lead to indecision and a loss of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是，這會使你變得猶豫不決而且信心全無。

sentences.english: In the first episode, he cried, saying: "I'm drained.
sentences.chinese: 在第一集中，他流着淚說，“我被榨乾了，氣力全無。

sentences.english: He tried to find out the cause, but all to no purpose.
sentences.chinese: 他試圖找出原因，但是全無結果。

sentences.english: Does the experience of boredom make you unmotivated and unexcited?
sentences.chinese: 厭倦的情緒是否使你激情和鬥志全無？

sentences.english: Not to mention that you will then be wide awake, too!
sentences.chinese: 更不用說隨後你的睡意定會全無。

sentences.english: In the interest of ventilation and lighting, bathrooms are losing all sense of privacy.
sentences.chinese: 隨着對通風和燈光的追求，浴室已經全無隱私可言。

sentences.english: If no children of the king, by his brother inherited.
sentences.chinese: 倘若國王子女全無，則由其弟繼承。

sentences.english: The apple crop was wiped out by blight.
sentences.chinese: 枯萎病使蘋果全無收成。

sentences.english: This did effectively allow me to skip the nap. I could stay awake for 8-9 hours straight without difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 這很管用，我在後續的8到9個小時睡意全無。
